author: Aina Khan
title: Anger as right-wing UK voices 'predict' Ramadan virus spread
description: Scapegoating narratives may pose additional dangers to public health, warn experts.
content:
London, United Kingdom - Concerns have been raised that right-wing voices in the United Kingdom could fuel Islamophobia, after a commentator predicted a "spike" in coronavirus cases during Ramadan.
Andrew Pierce, a journalist for the Daily Mail tabloid, twee… [+3897 chars]
